Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.filter

Interface ActionFilterBuilder<F,T,S,I,O>

Type Parameters:
F - the resulting filter type
T - action state type
S - string type
I - time instant type
O - time offset type
public interface ActionFilterBuilder<F,T,S,I,O>
Build an implementation-specific action filter

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • JSON

      static final ActionFilterBuilder<ActionFilter,ActionState,String,Instant,Long> JSON
      Do a "transformation" of the JSON representation to an exact copy.

    • QUERY

      static final ActionFilterBuilder<ca.on.oicr.gsi.Pair<String,Integer>,ActionState,String,Instant,Long> QUERY
      Converts an action filter to a query string

      The results include a precedence of the result. This can be discarded if used directly. If more concatenation is required, it can be used to determine if parentheses are necessary. Terminal expressions are 0, unary prefixes are 1, logical conjunction is 2, logical disjuncion is 3.

  • Method Details

    • added

      F added(Optional<I> start, Optional<I> end)
      Check that an action was last added in the time range provided
      Parameters:
      start - the exclusive cut-off timestamp
      end - the exclusive cut-off timestamp
      Returns:
      the constructed filter

    • addedAgo

      F addedAgo(O offset)
      Check that an action was added in a recent range
      Parameters:
      offset - the number of milliseconds ago
      Returns:
      the constructed filter

    • and

      F and(Stream<F> filters)
      Check that all of the filters match

      filters - the filters to match
      Returns:
      the constructed filter
